de.mpa.client.ui

Interface SortableTreeNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TreeNode, org.jdesktop.swingx.treetable.TreeTableNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PhylogenyTreeTableNode, SortableCheckBoxTreeTableNode

    public interface SortableTreeNode
extends org.jdesktop.swingx.treetable.TreeTableNode
    Common interface for sortable tree table nodes.
    Author:
    A. Behne

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Returns whether this node is capable of sorting its children.

      Returns the model index of the node's child at the specified view index.

      Returns the view index of the node's child at the specified model index.
      boolean isSorted()
      Returns whether this node's children are sorted.
      void reset()
      Resets this node's children's sort order to their original order.

      Sorts this node's list of children in accordance with the provided sort keys and filter.

      • sort

        void sort(List<? extends RowSorter.SortKey> sortKeys,
          RowFilter<? super TableModel,? super Integer> filter,
          boolean hideEmpty)
        Sorts this node's list of children in accordance with the provided sort keys and filter.
        Parameters:
        sortKeys - the list of sort keys
        filter - the row filter
        hideEmpty - true if non-leaf nodes with no visible children shall be hidden, false otherwise

        boolean canSort()
        Returns whether this node is capable of sorting its children.

      • canSort

        boolean canSort(List<? extends RowSorter.SortKey> sortKeys)
        Returns whether this node is capable of sorting specific columns of its children.
        Parameters:
